subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Robinho, Kaká and Adriano scored for Brazil, which easily defeated host Venezuela, 4-0, in a World Cup qualifier and secured second place at the halfway point of the South American qualifying tournament. It was the fourth straight defeat for Venezuela, which has never qualified for the World Cup.
